video.title: Intervention: Collection
video.synopsis: Addicts are confronted by loved ones and trained counselors urging them to commit to treatment or face serious consequences.

episodes.synopsis: Tina is the mother of a 3-year-old who spends her days gambling her house and car payments while stoned on prescription pills.
episodes.title: Tina

episodes.synopsis: Kelly is a man with a 160 IQ who lives on the streets and survives on beer and other people's spare change. Mark is addicted to painkillers.
episodes.title: Kelly F. and Mark

episodes.synopsis: Rachel has turned to heroin and prostitution. Tommy quit his executive job and sold his Lexus and million-dollar condo to sustain his cocaine habit.
episodes.title: Rachel and Tommy Update

episodes.synopsis: Corinne is a former honor student who started using drugs at age 14 after being sexually abused by a neighborhood boy who baby-sat her.
episodes.title: Corrine

episodes.synopsis: Salina suffers from severe bulimia. Troy had a promising future until his recreational crystal meth use escalated into a full-blown addiction.
episodes.title: Salina and Troy

episodes.synopsis: Annie is anorexic and bulimic. After Amy was sexually molested at 16, she turned to drugs and ended up living on park benches.
episodes.title: Annie and Amy

episodes.synopsis: Gina is losing a battle with drugs and compulsive gambling. Andrea is a 30-year-old divorced single mother addicted to alcohol and cocaine.
episodes.title: Gina and Andrea

episodes.synopsis: When family tragedies struck, Sylvia looked for solace in the bottle, and today, she is a frail, vulnerable alcoholic.
episodes.title: Sylvia

episodes.synopsis: Ryan, once a talented drummer who was awarded a music scholarship to the state university, is addicted to opiates.
episodes.title: Ryan

episodes.synopsis: Jacob, a banker by day, drinks and drives and often engages in barroom brawls most nights. He recently overdosed on alcohol and prescription drugs.
episodes.title: Jacob

episodes.synopsis: Anthony was a good athlete. But at 14, everything changed: His sister died of a heroin overdose. Anthony found comfort in cocaine.
episodes.title: Anthony

episodes.synopsis: Jessica, 21, is not allowed to work at her a family-owned gas station anymore since becoming addicted to heroin at 17.
episodes.title: Jessica and Hubert

episodes.synopsis: Laney is an outgoing, intelligent 36-year-old woman whose great life has been devastated by alcoholism.
episodes.title: Laney

episodes.synopsis: Leslie is a Sunday school teacher, PTA member, soccer mom of three and a raging alcoholic who sometimes resorts to economy-size bottles of mouthwash.
episodes.title: Leslie

episodes.synopsis: As a timber cutter, Coley has one of the most dangerous jobs in America. He increases his risks every day by snorting crystal meth.
episodes.title: Coley
